```{r}
library(tidyverse)

gapminder <- read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/resbaz/r-novice-gapminder-files/master/data/gapminder-FiveYearData.csv"
)

gapminder |>
  filter(continent == "Americas", year %in% c(1952, 2007)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = gdpPercap, y = country, color = factor(year))) +
  geom_line(aes(group = country), color = "grey") +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  labs(
    title = "GDP Growth in the Americas (1952 vs 2007)",
    x = "GDP per Capita",
    y = "Country",
    color = "Year"
  ) +
  theme_bw()
```
